Uses of Class
org.drip.analytics.eventday.Base

Packages that use Base
Package Description
org.drip.analytics.eventday
Fixed/Variable Custom Holiday Creation

  • Uses of Base in org.drip.analytics.eventday

    Subclasses of Base in org.drip.analytics.eventday
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Fixed
    Fixed contains the fixed holiday’s date and month.
    class  Static
    Static implements a complete date as a specific holiday.
    class  Variable
    Variable class contains the rule characterizing the variable holiday’s month, day in week, week in month, and the weekend days.
    Methods in org.drip.analytics.eventday that return types with arguments of type Base
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.Set<Base> Locale.holidays()
    Return the set of week day holidays
